title: Dragon's Grasp
content:
Dragon's Grasp Uncommon 2~10 Damage 1d6 Slashing+1d4 Slashing (Conditional) Burned Alive: Deals an additional 1-4 Slashing damage to Burning targets. Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: Somehow, this axe perpetually feels warms to the touch. Handaxe Light Thrown 0.9 65

1d6 Slashing+1d4 Slashing (Conditional)

Burned Alive: Deals an additional 1-4 Slashing damage to Burning targets.

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

Somehow, this axe perpetually feels warms to the touch.

Handa
